verses.text: \w And|strong="H1121"\w* \w the|strong="H6440"\w* \w sons|strong="H1121"\w* \w of|strong="H1121"\w* \w the|strong="H6440"\w* \w prophets|strong="H5030"\w* said \w unto|strong="H6440"\w* \w Elisha|strong="H3427"\w*, \w Behold|strong="H2009"\w* \w now|strong="H4994"\w*, \w the|strong="H6440"\w* \w place|strong="H4725"\w* \w where|strong="H8033"\w* \w we|strong="H3068"\w* \w dwell|strong="H3427"\w* \w before|strong="H6440"\w* \w thee|strong="H6440"\w* \w is|strong="H2009"\w* \w too|strong="H4480"\w* \w strait|strong="H6862"\w* \w for|strong="H6440"\w* \w us|strong="H4994"\w*.

\w Let|strong="H4994"\w* \w us|strong="H4994"\w* \w go|strong="H3212"\w*, \w we|strong="H3068"\w* \w pray|strong="H4994"\w* \w thee|strong="H6213"\w*, \w unto|strong="H6213"\w* \w the|strong="H3947"\w* \w Jordan|strong="H3383"\w*, \w and|strong="H3212"\w* \w take|strong="H3947"\w* \w thence|strong="H3947"\w* \w every|strong="H3212"\w* man \w a|strong="H3068"\w* \w beam|strong="H6982"\w*, \w and|strong="H3212"\w* \w let|strong="H4994"\w* \w us|strong="H4994"\w* \w make|strong="H6213"\w* \w us|strong="H4994"\w* \w a|strong="H3068"\w* \w place|strong="H4725"\w* \w there|strong="H8033"\w*, \w where|strong="H8033"\w* \w we|strong="H3068"\w* \w may|strong="H4994"\w* \w dwell|strong="H3427"\w*. \w And|strong="H3212"\w* \w he|strong="H5704"\w* answered, \w Go|strong="H3212"\w* \w ye|strong="H6213"\w*.

\w And|strong="H3212"\w* one said, \w Be|strong="H4994"\w* \w pleased|strong="H2974"\w*, \w I|strong="H5650"\w* \w pray|strong="H4994"\w* \w thee|strong="H4994"\w*, \w to|strong="H3212"\w* \w go|strong="H3212"\w* \w with|strong="H3212"\w* \w thy|strong="H5650"\w* \w servants|strong="H5650"\w*. \w And|strong="H3212"\w* \w he|strong="H3212"\w* answered, \w I|strong="H5650"\w* \w will|strong="H5650"\w* \w go|strong="H3212"\w*.

So \w he|strong="H3212"\w* \w went|strong="H3212"\w* \w with|strong="H3212"\w* them. \w And|strong="H3212"\w* when they \w came|strong="H3212"\w* \w to|strong="H3212"\w* \w the|strong="H3212"\w* \w Jordan|strong="H3383"\w*, they \w cut|strong="H1504"\w* \w down|strong="H1504"\w* \w wood|strong="H6086"\w*.

\w But|strong="H1961"\w* \w as|strong="H1961"\w* \w one|strong="H1931"\w* \w was|strong="H1961"\w* \w felling|strong="H5307"\w* \w a|strong="H3068"\w* \w beam|strong="H6982"\w*, \w the|strong="H1961"\w* axe-head \w fell|strong="H5307"\w* \w into|strong="H5307"\w* \w the|strong="H1961"\w* \w water|strong="H4325"\w*; \w and|strong="H4325"\w* \w he|strong="H1931"\w* \w cried|strong="H6817"\w*, \w and|strong="H4325"\w* said, Alas, \w my|strong="H1961"\w* master! \w for|strong="H4325"\w* \w it|strong="H1931"\w* \w was|strong="H1961"\w* \w borrowed|strong="H7592"\w*.

\w And|strong="H6086"\w* \w the|strong="H7200"\w* \w man|strong="H5307"\w* \w of|strong="H6086"\w* God said, \w Where|strong="H8033"\w* \w fell|strong="H5307"\w* \w it|strong="H7200"\w*? \w And|strong="H6086"\w* \w he|strong="H8033"\w* \w showed|strong="H7200"\w* \w him|strong="H7200"\w* \w the|strong="H7200"\w* \w place|strong="H4725"\w*. \w And|strong="H6086"\w* \w he|strong="H8033"\w* \w cut|strong="H7094"\w* \w down|strong="H5307"\w* \w a|strong="H3068"\w* \w stick|strong="H6086"\w*, \w and|strong="H6086"\w* \w cast|strong="H7993"\w* \w it|strong="H7200"\w* \w in|strong="H6086"\w* \w thither|strong="H8033"\w*, \w and|strong="H6086"\w* \w made|strong="H6086"\w* \w the|strong="H7200"\w* \w iron|strong="H1270"\w* \w to|strong="H8033"\w* \w swim|strong="H6687"\w*.

\w And|strong="H7971"\w* \w he|strong="H3027"\w* said, \w Take|strong="H3947"\w* \w it|strong="H7971"\w* \w up|strong="H7311"\w* \w to|strong="H7971"\w* \w thee|strong="H3027"\w*. \w So|strong="H3947"\w* \w he|strong="H3027"\w* \w put|strong="H7971"\w* \w out|strong="H7971"\w* \w his|strong="H7971"\w* \w hand|strong="H3027"\w*, \w and|strong="H7971"\w* \w took|strong="H3947"\w* \w it|strong="H7971"\w*.

\w Now|strong="H1961"\w* \w the|strong="H1961"\w* \w king|strong="H4428"\w* \w of|strong="H4428"\w* Syria \w was|strong="H1961"\w* \w warring|strong="H3898"\w* \w against|strong="H3898"\w* \w Israel|strong="H3478"\w*; \w and|strong="H3478"\w* \w he|strong="H3478"\w* \w took|strong="H1961"\w* \w counsel|strong="H3289"\w* \w with|strong="H3898"\w* \w his|strong="H3478"\w* \w servants|strong="H5650"\w*, saying, \w In|strong="H3478"\w* \w such|strong="H6423"\w* \w and|strong="H3478"\w* \w such|strong="H6423"\w* \w a|strong="H3068"\w* \w place|strong="H4725"\w* \w shall|strong="H3478"\w* \w be|strong="H1961"\w* \w my|strong="H1961"\w* \w camp|strong="H8466"\w*.

\w And|strong="H3478"\w* \w the|strong="H3588"\w* \w man|strong="H2088"\w* \w of|strong="H4428"\w* \w God|strong="H7971"\w* \w sent|strong="H7971"\w* \w unto|strong="H7971"\w* \w the|strong="H3588"\w* \w king|strong="H4428"\w* \w of|strong="H4428"\w* \w Israel|strong="H3478"\w*, saying, \w Beware|strong="H8104"\w* \w that|strong="H3588"\w* \w thou|strong="H3588"\w* \w pass|strong="H5674"\w* \w not|strong="H2088"\w* \w such|strong="H2088"\w* \w a|strong="H3068"\w* \w place|strong="H4725"\w*; \w for|strong="H3588"\w* \w thither|strong="H7971"\w* \w the|strong="H3588"\w* Syrians \w are|strong="H3478"\w* \w coming|strong="H5185"\w* \w down|strong="H7971"\w*.

\w And|strong="H3478"\w* \w the|strong="H8104"\w* \w king|strong="H4428"\w* \w of|strong="H4428"\w* \w Israel|strong="H3478"\w* \w sent|strong="H7971"\w* \w to|strong="H3478"\w* \w the|strong="H8104"\w* \w place|strong="H4725"\w* \w which|strong="H8033"\w* \w the|strong="H8104"\w* man \w of|strong="H4428"\w* \w God|strong="H3808"\w* told \w him|strong="H7971"\w* \w and|strong="H3478"\w* \w warned|strong="H2094"\w* \w him|strong="H7971"\w* \w of|strong="H4428"\w*; \w and|strong="H3478"\w* \w he|strong="H8033"\w* \w saved|strong="H8104"\w* \w himself|strong="H8104"\w* \w there|strong="H8033"\w*, \w not|strong="H3808"\w* once \w nor|strong="H3808"\w* \w twice|strong="H8147"\w*.

\w And|strong="H3478"\w* \w the|strong="H5921"\w* \w heart|strong="H3820"\w* \w of|strong="H4428"\w* \w the|strong="H5921"\w* \w king|strong="H4428"\w* \w of|strong="H4428"\w* Syria \w was|strong="H3478"\w* sore \w troubled|strong="H5590"\w* \w for|strong="H5921"\w* \w this|strong="H2088"\w* \w thing|strong="H1697"\w*; \w and|strong="H3478"\w* \w he|strong="H3808"\w* \w called|strong="H7121"\w* \w his|strong="H7121"\w* \w servants|strong="H5650"\w*, \w and|strong="H3478"\w* \w said|strong="H1697"\w* \w unto|strong="H7121"\w* \w them|strong="H5921"\w*, \w Will|strong="H4310"\w* \w ye|strong="H3820"\w* \w not|strong="H3808"\w* \w show|strong="H5046"\w* \w me|strong="H5046"\w* \w which|strong="H7945"\w* \w of|strong="H4428"\w* \w us|strong="H5046"\w* \w is|strong="H2088"\w* \w for|strong="H5921"\w* \w the|strong="H5921"\w* \w king|strong="H4428"\w* \w of|strong="H4428"\w* \w Israel|strong="H3478"\w*?

\w And|strong="H3478"\w* \w one|strong="H3808"\w* \w of|strong="H4428"\w* \w his|strong="H5046"\w* \w servants|strong="H5650"\w* \w said|strong="H1696"\w*, \w Nay|strong="H3808"\w*, \w my|strong="H5046"\w* lord, \w O|strong="H3068"\w* \w king|strong="H4428"\w*; \w but|strong="H3588"\w* Elisha, \w the|strong="H3588"\w* \w prophet|strong="H5030"\w* \w that|strong="H3588"\w* \w is|strong="H1697"\w* \w in|strong="H3478"\w* \w Israel|strong="H3478"\w*, \w telleth|strong="H5046"\w* \w the|strong="H3588"\w* \w king|strong="H4428"\w* \w of|strong="H4428"\w* \w Israel|strong="H3478"\w* \w the|strong="H3588"\w* \w words|strong="H1697"\w* \w that|strong="H3588"\w* \w thou|strong="H3588"\w* \w speakest|strong="H1696"\w* \w in|strong="H3478"\w* \w thy|strong="H5046"\w* \w bedchamber|strong="H2315"\w*.

\w And|strong="H7971"\w* \w he|strong="H1931"\w* said, \w Go|strong="H3212"\w* \w and|strong="H7971"\w* \w see|strong="H7200"\w* \w where|strong="H2009"\w* \w he|strong="H1931"\w* \w is|strong="H1931"\w*, \w that|strong="H7200"\w* \w I|strong="H2009"\w* \w may|strong="H1931"\w* \w send|strong="H7971"\w* \w and|strong="H7971"\w* \w fetch|strong="H3947"\w* \w him|strong="H7971"\w*. \w And|strong="H7971"\w* \w it|strong="H1931"\w* \w was|strong="H1931"\w* \w told|strong="H5046"\w* \w him|strong="H7971"\w*, saying, \w Behold|strong="H2009"\w*, \w he|strong="H1931"\w* \w is|strong="H1931"\w* \w in|strong="H3212"\w* \w Dothan|strong="H1886"\w*.

\w Therefore|strong="H5921"\w* \w sent|strong="H7971"\w* \w he|strong="H8033"\w* \w thither|strong="H7971"\w* \w horses|strong="H5483"\w*, \w and|strong="H7971"\w* \w chariots|strong="H7393"\w*, \w and|strong="H7971"\w* \w a|strong="H3068"\w* \w great|strong="H3515"\w* \w host|strong="H2428"\w*: \w and|strong="H7971"\w* \w they|strong="H8033"\w* came \w by|strong="H5921"\w* \w night|strong="H3915"\w*, \w and|strong="H7971"\w* \w compassed|strong="H5362"\w* \w the|strong="H5921"\w* \w city|strong="H5892"\w* \w about|strong="H5921"\w*.

\w And|strong="H6965"\w* \w when|strong="H3318"\w* \w the|strong="H6213"\w* \w servant|strong="H5288"\w* \w of|strong="H5892"\w* \w the|strong="H6213"\w* \w man|strong="H5288"\w* \w of|strong="H5892"\w* God \w was|strong="H5892"\w* \w risen|strong="H6965"\w* \w early|strong="H7925"\w*, \w and|strong="H6965"\w* \w gone|strong="H3318"\w* \w forth|strong="H3318"\w*, \w behold|strong="H2009"\w*, \w a|strong="H3068"\w* \w host|strong="H2428"\w* \w with|strong="H6213"\w* \w horses|strong="H5483"\w* \w and|strong="H6965"\w* \w chariots|strong="H7393"\w* \w was|strong="H5892"\w* \w round|strong="H5892"\w* \w about|strong="H5437"\w* \w the|strong="H6213"\w* \w city|strong="H5892"\w*. \w And|strong="H6965"\w* \w his|strong="H6965"\w* \w servant|strong="H5288"\w* \w said|strong="H3318"\w* \w unto|strong="H6213"\w* \w him|strong="H6213"\w*, Alas, \w my|strong="H6965"\w* master! \w how|strong="H2009"\w* \w shall|strong="H5892"\w* \w we|strong="H3068"\w* \w do|strong="H6213"\w*?

\w And|strong="H3372"\w* \w he|strong="H3588"\w* answered, \w Fear|strong="H3372"\w* \w not|strong="H3588"\w*; \w for|strong="H3588"\w* \w they|strong="H3588"\w* \w that|strong="H3588"\w* \w are|strong="H7227"\w* \w with|strong="H7227"\w* \w us|strong="H3588"\w* \w are|strong="H7227"\w* \w more|strong="H7227"\w* \w than|strong="H3588"\w* \w they|strong="H3588"\w* \w that|strong="H3588"\w* \w are|strong="H7227"\w* \w with|strong="H7227"\w* \w them|strong="H3588"\w*.

\w And|strong="H3068"\w* Elisha \w prayed|strong="H6419"\w*, \w and|strong="H3068"\w* said, \w Jehovah|strong="H3068"\w*, \w I|strong="H2009"\w* \w pray|strong="H6419"\w* \w thee|strong="H5869"\w*, \w open|strong="H6491"\w* \w his|strong="H3068"\w* \w eyes|strong="H5869"\w*, \w that|strong="H7200"\w* \w he|strong="H3068"\w* \w may|strong="H4994"\w* \w see|strong="H7200"\w*. \w And|strong="H3068"\w* \w Jehovah|strong="H3068"\w* \w opened|strong="H6491"\w* \w the|strong="H7200"\w* \w eyes|strong="H5869"\w* \w of|strong="H3068"\w* \w the|strong="H7200"\w* \w young|strong="H5288"\w* \w man|strong="H5288"\w*; \w and|strong="H3068"\w* \w he|strong="H3068"\w* \w saw|strong="H7200"\w*: \w and|strong="H3068"\w*, \w behold|strong="H2009"\w*, \w the|strong="H7200"\w* \w mountain|strong="H2022"\w* \w was|strong="H3068"\w* \w full|strong="H4390"\w* \w of|strong="H3068"\w* \w horses|strong="H5483"\w* \w and|strong="H3068"\w* \w chariots|strong="H7393"\w* \w of|strong="H3068"\w* fire \w round|strong="H5439"\w* \w about|strong="H5439"\w* Elisha.

\w And|strong="H3068"\w* \w when|strong="H3068"\w* \w they|strong="H3068"\w* \w came|strong="H3381"\w* \w down|strong="H3381"\w* \w to|strong="H3381"\w* \w him|strong="H5221"\w*, Elisha \w prayed|strong="H6419"\w* \w unto|strong="H3068"\w* \w Jehovah|strong="H3068"\w*, \w and|strong="H3068"\w* \w said|strong="H1697"\w*, \w Smite|strong="H5221"\w* \w this|strong="H2088"\w* \w people|strong="H1471"\w*, \w I|strong="H1697"\w* \w pray|strong="H6419"\w* \w thee|strong="H4994"\w*, \w with|strong="H3068"\w* \w blindness|strong="H5575"\w*. \w And|strong="H3068"\w* \w he|strong="H3068"\w* \w smote|strong="H5221"\w* \w them|strong="H5221"\w* \w with|strong="H3068"\w* \w blindness|strong="H5575"\w* according \w to|strong="H3381"\w* \w the|strong="H5221"\w* \w word|strong="H1697"\w* \w of|strong="H3068"\w* Elisha.

\w And|strong="H3212"\w* Elisha said \w unto|strong="H3212"\w* \w them|strong="H2088"\w*, \w This|strong="H2088"\w* \w is|strong="H2088"\w* \w not|strong="H3808"\w* \w the|strong="H1870"\w* \w way|strong="H1870"\w*, \w neither|strong="H3808"\w* \w is|strong="H2088"\w* \w this|strong="H2088"\w* \w the|strong="H1870"\w* \w city|strong="H5892"\w*: \w follow|strong="H3212"\w* \w me|strong="H3808"\w*, \w and|strong="H3212"\w* \w I|strong="H2088"\w* \w will|strong="H5892"\w* \w bring|strong="H3212"\w* \w you|strong="H3808"\w* \w to|strong="H3212"\w* \w the|strong="H1870"\w* \w man|strong="H2088"\w* whom \w ye|strong="H3808"\w* \w seek|strong="H1245"\w*. \w And|strong="H3212"\w* \w he|strong="H3808"\w* \w led|strong="H3212"\w* \w them|strong="H2088"\w* \w to|strong="H3212"\w* \w Samaria|strong="H8111"\w*.

\w And|strong="H3068"\w* \w it|strong="H8432"\w* \w came|strong="H1961"\w* \w to|strong="H3068"\w* \w pass|strong="H1961"\w*, \w when|strong="H1961"\w* \w they|strong="H3068"\w* \w were|strong="H1961"\w* \w come|strong="H1961"\w* \w into|strong="H8432"\w* \w Samaria|strong="H8111"\w*, \w that|strong="H7200"\w* Elisha said, \w Jehovah|strong="H3068"\w*, \w open|strong="H6491"\w* \w the|strong="H7200"\w* \w eyes|strong="H5869"\w* \w of|strong="H3068"\w* these men, \w that|strong="H7200"\w* \w they|strong="H3068"\w* \w may|strong="H1961"\w* \w see|strong="H7200"\w*. \w And|strong="H3068"\w* \w Jehovah|strong="H3068"\w* \w opened|strong="H6491"\w* \w their|strong="H3068"\w* \w eyes|strong="H5869"\w*, \w and|strong="H3068"\w* \w they|strong="H3068"\w* \w saw|strong="H7200"\w*; \w and|strong="H3068"\w*, \w behold|strong="H2009"\w*, \w they|strong="H3068"\w* \w were|strong="H1961"\w* \w in|strong="H3068"\w* \w the|strong="H7200"\w* \w midst|strong="H8432"\w* \w of|strong="H3068"\w* \w Samaria|strong="H8111"\w*.

\w And|strong="H3478"\w* \w the|strong="H7200"\w* \w king|strong="H4428"\w* \w of|strong="H4428"\w* \w Israel|strong="H3478"\w* said \w unto|strong="H7200"\w* Elisha, \w when|strong="H7200"\w* \w he|strong="H5221"\w* \w saw|strong="H7200"\w* \w them|strong="H5221"\w*, \w My|strong="H7200"\w* father, \w shall|strong="H3478"\w* \w I|strong="H7200"\w* \w smite|strong="H5221"\w* \w them|strong="H5221"\w*? \w shall|strong="H3478"\w* \w I|strong="H7200"\w* \w smite|strong="H5221"\w* \w them|strong="H5221"\w*?

\w And|strong="H3212"\w* \w he|strong="H3808"\w* answered, \w Thou|strong="H6440"\w* shalt \w not|strong="H3808"\w* \w smite|strong="H5221"\w* \w them|strong="H6440"\w*: wouldest \w thou|strong="H6440"\w* \w smite|strong="H5221"\w* those \w whom|strong="H6440"\w* \w thou|strong="H6440"\w* hast \w taken|strong="H7617"\w* \w captive|strong="H7617"\w* \w with|strong="H6440"\w* \w thy|strong="H7760"\w* \w sword|strong="H2719"\w* \w and|strong="H3212"\w* \w with|strong="H6440"\w* \w thy|strong="H7760"\w* \w bow|strong="H7198"\w*? \w set|strong="H7760"\w* \w bread|strong="H3899"\w* \w and|strong="H3212"\w* \w water|strong="H4325"\w* \w before|strong="H6440"\w* \w them|strong="H6440"\w*, \w that|strong="H4325"\w* \w they|strong="H3808"\w* \w may|strong="H4325"\w* \w eat|strong="H3899"\w* \w and|strong="H3212"\w* \w drink|strong="H8354"\w*, \w and|strong="H3212"\w* \w go|strong="H3212"\w* \w to|strong="H3212"\w* \w their|strong="H7760"\w* master.
